original_title: ورود هیئت فرستاده دربار بریتانیا به تهران
overview: The films shows the arrival of a group from the British court in Tehran from the streets to the palace, in order to gift the Order of Garter to Mozaffar Ad-Din Shah , on behalf of King Edward VII. At the head of the delegation Lord Lansdowne, Foreign Secretary and Sir Arthur Hardinge, senior council of British Empire can be seen.
title: Arrival of the British Court Envoys in Tehran
